import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import style from './costum.module.css' export default function Calce() { const [count,setcount] = useState(0); const [cou,setcou] = useState(0); const [c,setc] = useState(0); const inputRef = useRef(); function snow(a) { setcount(a); inputRef.current.backgroundColor="red" } return (

setcou(0)}>100mw 0 € setcou(200)}>150mw 200 € setcou(500)}>200mw 500 €

wrap drive
